apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices captures a tender moment between a man with a light skin tone and a woman with a dark skin tone, sharing a gentle kiss. Rendered with Apple's characteristic soft rounded edges and smooth gradients, their faces are depicted with subtle expressions of affection. The realistic lighting and glossy finish on their cheeks add a touch of warmth and intimacy, making this emoji a beautiful way to express romantic love, deep connection, or heartfelt goodbyes.
